document_data.caption: A map showing Madame Garah's boarding house (labeled #3) on Slop Street.
document_data.name: Madame Garah's Boarding House
document_data.mainbody: '''Madame Garah's Boarding House''' was a row house used as a boarding house located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: Madame Garah's Boarding House was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] within the [[Waterdeep/Adventurers' Quarter|Adventurers' Quarter]] on the south side of [[Slop Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
document_data.Inhabitants: As its name implied, the boarding house was owned and run by [[Madame Garah]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
